titleInfo.title: Roy Acuff recording session 1951-09-24 - Just A Friend [issued]

mods.abstract: Roy Acuff recording of Just A Friend from September 24, 1951 studio session. Released as Columbia 20877 (b-side). Session/master number (NASH-1293) is out of sync with other Castle Studio sessions numbers, and overlaps with a Curley Williams session dated September 13, 1951.
